about_the_game:
What happened to Shea after that dangerous encounter at the end of Chapter 2 in Faylinn's Quest?

To see more of this gorgeous innkeeper and find out her side of the story, download the Magical Side Story DLC!
This DLC adds the following to the base game:
- Two new recruitable companions: Raz and Shea!
- These characters have two unique classes: Battlemage and Innkeeper
- 2 beautiful pieces of illustration (Raz's portrait and their romance ending scene together)
- A short playable story independent from the main game
- One extra ending scene if you recruit them in the main game

FAQ
How do I unlock the side story once I download the DLC?
1) Complete Chapter 2 in the base game (that's when Shea shows up)
2) Launch a new game and choose "Side Story"

How do I recruit them in Faylinn's Quest?
1) Reach the final town in Chapter 3
2) Meet them at the Inn

Have fun!

content_descriptors.notes: Full nudity in the last scene.
